Name: GreatHelm
Description: Actually, is not that great.

Name: Iron-Helm
Description: Of high quality, but lacking style.

Name: Spiritforged Helmet
Description: Blessed by spirits of the forest. So they say...

Name: Necropolis Helm
Description: Minions, servants, soldiers of the cold dark, obey my call!

Name: Crown of Forgotten Kings
Description: The roar of a thousand drums, echo through this land!

Name: Titan's Outlook
Description: Oh Lord Prometheus, it's a fire!

Name: Helm of purified Thoughts
Description: The real ornament of woman is her character, her purity.

Name: Skeleton Lord's Cranium
Description: I am the bone of my sword!

Name: Aegis Faceguard
Description: It is not possible either to trick or escape the mind of Zeus.

Name: Greathelm of Wrath
Description: Throw away thy rod, throw away thy wrath; O my God, take the gentle path.

Name: Goswhit
Description: One day, a King will come, and the Sword will rise... again.

Name: Helmet of Darkness
Description: Now i know there is beauty in Darkness.

Name: Tyrant's Greaves
Description: Forged under a strict discipline.

Name: Stonestep Boots
Description: Perfect mobility for combat.

Name: Lucidity Shoes
Description: Nothing can make you fall in reality.

Name: Wraithplate Treads
Description: From the deep of the lake, from the strongest wraith.

Name: Blackrock Greaves
Description: Greaves made from a rare mineral that only exists in a hidden cave.

Name: Mosscrusher Sabatons
Description: Made it to last, until death.

Name: Warboots of Cruelty
Description: From the most brutal warchief in a while.

Name: Treads of the Defiler
Description: He would kill them in the most brutal ways possible.

Name: Shoes of Vidar (Norse)
Description: Shoes that vidar wore or whatever.

Name: Steel Gaunlets
Description: Imitation of Wonderwoman Gauntles.

Name: Amberplate Grips
Description: If you want armor and some fashion sense.

Name: Bonefist Gaunlets
Description: Fist decorated with bones from every creature the master kills.

Name: Demolisher's Grips
Description: Great equipment for melee attacks.

Name: Necropolis Gloves
Description: Forged in the underworld, they have the powers to command the undead.

Name: Plate Claws of the Dragon
Description: Reward from killing the dragon of the mountain.

Name: Destroyer Gaunlets
Description: From one of the greatest warrior, known as destroyer of worlds.

Name: Ice-Encrusted Gloves
Description: From the icy regions of the planet, delivered by a penguin.

Name: Onslaught Gauntlets
Description: When it smells blood nothing can stop it.

Name: Midas Touch
Description: Everything turns to gold, just like that yeah.

Name: Ravager's Armor
Description: This armor is to be worn all the time so it can become adjusted to the person.

Name: Steel Chestplate
Description: Nothing beats steel.

Name: Cobalt Chespiece
Description: Decorated with cobalt making it durable and awesome.

Name: Ornamented Chestguard
Description: One of the smoothest plate around.

Name: Sunblessed Battleplate
Description: Created in a ritual to harness the power of the sun.

Name: Battlechest of the Twilight
Description: It powers up in nights of full moon.

Name: Dragonstorm Breastplate
Description: Summon a storm making the ideal weather for this armor.

Name: Frost Wyrm Ribcage
Description: Ribcage type of armor capable of freezing your weapon.

Name: Gladiator's Plate Chestpiece
Description: Nothin can withstand more damage than a gladiator´s armor.

Name: Hide of Nemean Lion
Description: Taken from a giant lion, this armor was worn by Hercules.

Name: Plate Legguards
Description: Perfect against arrows.

Name: Steel Leggings
Description: One of the most common armours.

Name: Tempered Leggings
Description: This is tempered steel making it stronger.

Name: Ornamented Leggings
Description: Decorated to make an impact when you arrive.

Name: JUsticar Greaves
Description: Used by officials of justice.

Name: Warlord's Iron-Legplates
Description: From one of the strongest warlords, rumors say this armour belonged to him.

Name: Legguards of Endless Rage
Description: No matter how hard the situation is this armour will never fail.

Name: Gladiator's Legguards
Description: With some marks of usage, this armour can make you use your legs as weapons.

Name: Thor's Legplates
Description: They shoot lightning too.
